data.value: The algorithm is an implementation of the block diagram shown on page 129 of the Vaidyanathan text  (Figure 4.3-8d).
The direct approach of upsampling by factor of P with zero insertion, FIR filtering of length
, and downsampling by factor of Q is O(N*Q) per output sample. The polyphase implementation used here is O(N/P).
The axis of the input data array along which to apply the linear filter. The filter is applied to each subarray along this axis. Default is -1.
The signal extension mode to use. The set
implements a smooth extension by extending based on the slope of the last 2 points at each end of the array.
